languages.text: {n}Момент, когда Номос покидают мостик, заметен невооруженным взглядом — сервиторы перестают двигаться идеально синхронно и медленно разбредаются по своим постам.{/n}
{n}One can detect with the naked eye the moment when Nomos leaves the bridge — the servitors stop moving in sync and slowly shuffle off to their posts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Момент, когда Номос покидают мостик, заметен невооруженным взглядом — сервиторы перестают двигаться идеально синхронно и медленно разбредаются по своим постам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}One can detect with the naked eye the moment when Nomos leaves the bridge — the servitors stop moving in sync and slowly shuffle off to their posts.{/n}
{n}One can detect with the naked eye the moment when Nomos leaves the bridge — the servitors stop moving in sync and slowly shuffle off to their posts.{/n}

{n}One can detect with the naked eye the moment when Nomos leaves the bridge — the servitors stop moving in sync and slowly shuffle off to their posts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}肉眼でもノモスがブリッジを去るのが見えた。サーヴィターは一斉に動きを止めるとゆっくりと自身の持ち場へよろめきながら進んでいった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One can detect with the naked eye the moment when Nomos leaves the bridge — the servitors stop moving in sync and slowly shuffle off to their posts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}肉眼でもノモスがブリッジを去るのが見えた。サーヴィターは一斉に動きを止めるとゆっくりと自身の持ち場へよろめきながら進んでいった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你可以用肉眼感觉到诺莫斯离开了舰桥。所有机仆不再做着整齐划一的动作，而是慢慢地朝各自的岗位走去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One can detect with the naked eye the moment when Nomos leaves the bridge — the servitors stop moving in sync and slowly shuffle off to their posts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你可以用肉眼感觉到诺莫斯离开了舰桥。所有奴工不再做着整齐划一的动作，而是慢慢地朝各自的岗位走去。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Man kann mit dem nackten Auge den Moment erkennen, in dem Nomos die Brücke verlässt — die Servitoren hören auf, sich synchron zu bewegen, und wackeln langsam zu ihren Posten zurück.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One can detect with the naked eye the moment when Nomos leaves the bridge — the servitors stop moving in sync and slowly shuffle off to their posts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Man kann mit dem nackten Auge den Moment erkennen, in dem Nomos die Brücke verlässt — die Servitoren hören auf, sich synchron zu bewegen, und wackeln langsam zu ihren Posten zurück.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le moment où Nomos quitte le passerelle est facilement identifiable : les servitors cessent de se déplacer simultanément et reprennent lentement leurs activités.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One can detect with the naked eye the moment when Nomos leaves the bridge — the servitors stop moving in sync and slowly shuffle off to their posts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le moment où Nomos quitte le passerelle est facilement identifiable : les servitors cessent de se déplacer simultanément et reprennent lentement leurs activités.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se nota a simple vista el momento en que Nomos abandona el puente de mando; los servidores dejan de moverse en sincronía y se dirigen a sus puestos habituales arrastrando los pies.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One can detect with the naked eye the moment when Nomos leaves the bridge — the servitors stop moving in sync and slowly shuffle off to their posts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se nota a simple vista el momento en que Nomos abandona el puente de mando; los servidores dejan de moverse en sincronía y se dirigen a sus puestos habituales arrastrando los pies.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nomos'un köprüyü terk ettiğini çıplak gözle fark etmemek mümkün değil. Hizmetörler, aynı anda hareket etmeyi kesiyor ve ağır ağır sallanarak yerlerine çekiliyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One can detect with the naked eye the moment when Nomos leaves the bridge — the servitors stop moving in sync and slowly shuffle off to their posts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Herhangi biri, Nomos'un köprüyü terk ettiği anı çıplak gözleriyle fark edebilir. Hizmetörler eş zamanlı olarak hareket etmeyi kesiyor ve ağır ağır sallanarak mevkiilerine çekiliyorlar.{/n}
